summary: The diff implements the overall step-based SPA structure and warm romantic styling, but several requirements are missing or not met exactly: the quiz Yes/No button labels are not exactly "Yes"/"No", the post-quiz "Game" button step is not implemented as specified, the tap feedback is not guaranteed to appear for every registered tap, the site/browser title metadata change is not evidenced, and the required heart icon image asset is not shown as being used (Lucide icons are used instead). Unrequested Internet Identity/auth scaffolding and an empty backend actor were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Quiz questions must be presented with two buttons labeled exactly "Yes" and "No".
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented buttons include extra emoji text ("Yes ðŸ’š" and "No ðŸ’”"), so the labels are not exactly "Yes" and "No".

missing_requirements.requirement: After the quiz, add a "Game" button shown after the quiz is completed; clicking it reveals the chibi dino intro dialogue and a start button.
missing_requirements.reason: The app transitions directly from quiz completion to the game intro step without a dedicated post-quiz "Game" button, and the game intro uses a "Let's Play!" button rather than a "Game" button.

missing_requirements.requirement: During the tapping game, on each tap show a floating feedback message (from a pool including the specified strings) and a per-tap cute effect; petals animate during gameplay.
missing_requirements.reason: Tap counting is driven by a document-level `pointerdown` listener, but floating feedback/effects are created only in `handleTap` (pointer events on the tapping area). This means some registered taps may not produce the required visible feedback/effect, so it is not evidenced that "each tap" triggers feedback.

missing_requirements.requirement: Set the app/site (browser tab) title metadata to "KBK&TC.com".
missing_requirements.reason: The UI header displays "KBK&TC.com", but no HTML/metadata file change is shown that sets the document title, and no code shown sets `document.title`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the generated small heart UI icon/button graphic from `frontend/public/assets/generated` for at least one heart button.
missing_requirements.reason: Buttons use Lucide React vector icons (`Heart` from `lucide-react`) rather than an `` using `/assets/generated/heart-button-icon.dim_512x512.png`. Only the dino and petal generated images are referenced in code.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider scaffolding (login context, actor creation tied to identity, React Query integration).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states user accounts/login are non-goals and Internet Identity is not required for this app; nevertheless, substantial II/auth plumbing was added.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister actor file added as an empty actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: Backend changes were stated as not required unless explicitly needed; the frontend flow appears fully client-side and the backend actor is empty.
